title: Simulation/VR-Based Self-Directed Language Inquiry Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary digital literacy and understanding of basic language learning concepts
context.additional_context: Inquiry-Based Education Where Learners Explore and Solve Problems in Simulated/VR Language Environments

learning_goals: Learners can autonomously design and execute language problem-solving processes using POEE scaffolding.
Learners can complete language inquiry activities reflecting cultural contexts in simulation/VR environments at least 80% of the time.
Learners can produce a portfolio demonstrating self-directed learning outcomes through project-based assessments.

resources: VR Headsets and Simulation Software Licenses
Digital Content Library for Language Exploration

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
